# k8s_flagger_app_metric_template_v1beta1 (Resource)

MetricTemplate is the Schema for the MetricTemplates API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "k8s_flagger_app_metric_template_v1beta1" "minimal" {
  metadata = {
    name = "test"
  }
}
```
